branches.name: feature/weighted-edits
branches.rationale: To enhance similarity scoring by allowing certain character substitutions to count differently in edit distance calculations.

commits.title: Implement distance_with_weights method
commits.body: Added a new method to calculate edit distance with weighted character substitutions.

commits.title: Update __init__.py for new method
commits.body: Included distance_with_weights in the module's API.

commits.title: Update documentation for distance_with_weights
commits.body: Documented the new API method distance_with_weights.

branches.name: feature/pure-python-fallback
branches.rationale: To maintain functionality on platforms where the C extension cannot compile, enhancing portability.

src/Levenshtein/levenshtein_py.dart: Add fallback module for pure Python implementation
docs/levenshtein.rst: Document the fallback module and its performance trade-off

commits.title: Add pure-Python fallback module
commits.body: Implemented a fallback module for environments without C extension support.
per_file_changes: Added pure-Python implementation of Levenshtein distance

commits.title: Update __init__.py for fallback module
commits.body: Included fallback module in the module's API.

commits.title: Document fallback module
commits.body: Added documentation for the pure-Python fallback module.
per_file_changes: Documented the fallback module and its performance trade-off

branches.name: feature/max-distance-cutoff
branches.rationale: To improve performance by allowing the distance method to return early for inputs exceeding a specified threshold.

src/Levenshtein/levenshtein_cpp.pyx: Add new methods distance(s1, s2, max_dist=N) and similarity(s1, s2, max_dist=N)
tests/test_levenshtein_distance.py: Add tests for max distance functionality

commits.title: Implement max distance methods
commits.body: Added distance and similarity methods with max distance parameter.
per_file_changes: Added distance(s1, s2, max_dist=N) and similarity(s1, s2, max_dist=N)

commits.title: Add tests for max distance methods
commits.body: Implemented tests to ensure max distance functionality works as expected.
per_file_changes: Added test cases for distance and similarity with max distance

branches.name: feature/edit-operations-path
branches.rationale: To provide detailed insights into the edit operations performed during distance calculations.

commits.title: Implement distance_with_ops method
commits.body: Added a method to return the edit operations path.

commits.title: Add tests for distance_with_ops
commits.body: Implemented tests to validate the output of distance_with_ops.

branches.name: feature/multi-threaded-batch
branches.rationale: To allow faster processing of large lists of strings for similarity ranking through parallel computation.

src/Levenshtein/levenshtein_cpp.pyx: Add new batch method batch_distance(list1, list2, threads=T)
tests/test_levenshtein_distance.py: Add performance test case for batch_distance

commits.title: Implement batch_distance method
commits.body: Added a method for batch processing of distance calculations.

commits.title: Add performance tests for batch_distance
commits.body: Implemented tests to evaluate the performance of batch_distance.
per_file_changes: Added performance test cases for batch_distance

branches.name: feature/unicode-grapheme-clusters
branches.rationale: To ensure multi-codepoint characters are treated as single units in distance calculations, improving correctness.

tests/test_levenshtein_distance.py: Add tests for grapheme cluster scenarios

commits.title: Add support for grapheme clusters
commits.body: Implemented an optional parameter to handle grapheme clusters.
per_file_changes: Added use_graphemes parameter to relevant methods

commits.title: Add tests for grapheme clusters
commits.body: Implemented tests to validate behavior with grapheme clusters.
per_file_changes: Added test cases for grapheme cluster handling
